resources.string: An interactive social-media app, that is supposed to motivate people to meet new friends and more. It works with Bluetooth LE, which scans the surroundings anonymously and notifys you, if it finds marked friends of you or new people, that have the same interests as you. So, if you want to enter a new adventure, let\'s start it!

Please accept and allow some necessary permissions and let\'s start immediately! Don\'t worry, this app can work without internet and does not send any data to any server, if you don\'t want it to! We only save data to Firebase, a cloud-solution provided by Google, such as friends, time spend with them and more. But, it will short out the functionality! A more precise list of data, that is collected and saved online can be found on the official Github!
If you need help or have some questions, feel free to contact me through E-Mail. Or if you are feeling lucky and you want to support the work, feel free to buy me a coffee instead :D
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
